SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY --파일대상KEY , A.CO_CD --회사코드 , R.CODE_NM AS CO_NM , A.MATR_CD --자재코드 , M.MATR_NM --자재명 , M.GOODS_DIV --제품/자재구분 , R1.CODE_NM AS GOODS_DIV_NM , M.MATR_CLNT_DIV --거래처구분 , R2.CODE_NM AS MATR_CLNT_DIV_NM , M.MATR_DIV --자재유형 , R3.CODE_NM AS MATR_DIV_NM , M.MATR_GRP --자재분류-자재그룹 , R4.CODE_NM AS MATR_GRP_NM , M.MATR_MAT --소재 , M.MATR_SPEC --규격 , M.MATR_MAKR_NM --제조사 , M.MATR_MNO --형번(Model No) , M.MATR_UNIT --단위 , R5.CODE_NM AS MATR_UNIT_NM , M.DLVR_RQM_DAY --리드타임(납품소요일자) , M.MATR_PURC_DIV --구매/외주구분 , R7.CODE_NM AS MATR_PURC_DIV_NM , A.CLNT_CD --거래처 , C.CLNT_NM AS CLNT_NM , A.CURR_CD --통화단위 , R8.CODE_NM AS CURR_NM , TO_CHAR(A.ADPT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADPT_DT --적용일자 , A.UPR_DIV --단가구분 , R9.CODE_NM AS UPR_DIV_NM , NVL(A.MATR_UPR, 0) AS MATR_UPR --구매단가 , NVL(A.DEDUCT_UPR, 0) AS DEDUCT_UPR --공제단가 , A.MATR_UPR_RMK --비고 , NVL(A.USE_YN, 'N') AS USE_YN --사용여부 , A.CREAT_ID --생성자 , U1.NAME AS CREAT_ID_NM , A.CREAT_PGM --생성프로그램ID , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , A.UDT_ID --최종변경자 , U2.NAME AS UDT_ID_NM , A.UDT_PGM --최종수정프로그램ID , TO_CHAR(A.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM FROM TB_BM11M01 AS A JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD , MATR_CD , CLNT_CD , CURR_CD , MAX(ADPT_DT) AS ADPT_DT FROM TB_BM11M01 GROUP BY CO_CD, MATR_CD, CLNT_CD, CURR_CD ) AS B ON B.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND B.MATR_CD = A.MATR_CD AND B.CLNT_CD = A.CLNT_CD AND B.CURR_CD = A.CURR_CD AND B.ADPT_DT = A.ADPT_DT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS C ON C.CLNT_CD = A.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM05M01 AS M ON M.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND M.MATR_CD = A.MATR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = A.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = M.GOODS_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R2 ON R2.CODE_ID = M.MATR_CLNT_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R3 ON R3.CODE_ID = M.MATR_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R4 ON R4.CODE_ID = M.MATR_GRP LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R5 ON R5.CODE_ID = M.MATR_UNIT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R7 ON R7.CODE_ID = M.MATR_PURC_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R8 ON R8.CODE_ID = A.CURR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R9 ON R9.CODE_ID = A.UPR_DIV --생성자 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U1 ON U1.ID = A.CREAT_ID --변경자 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U2 ON U2.ID = A.UDT_ID WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd}
AND A.MATR_CD LIKE '%' || #{matrCd} || '%'
AND A.MATR_NM LIKE '%' || #{matrNm} || '%'
AND A.MATR_MNO LIKE '%' || #{matrMno} || '%'
AND A.CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}
AND A.CLNT_NM LIKE '%' || #{clntNm} || '%'
ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.CLNT_CD, A.CURR_CD, A.UPR_DIV ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 )

SELECT DISTINCT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY --파일대상KEY , A.CO_CD --회사코드 , A.CLNT_CD --거래처 , C.CLNT_NM AS CLNT_NM , A.UPR_DIV --단가구분 , TO_CHAR(A.ADPT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADPT_DT --적용일자 , A.MATR_CD --자재코드 , M.MATR_NM --자재명 , M.MATR_SPEC --규격 , M.MATR_MAT --소재 , M.MATR_MAKR_NM --제조사 , M.MATR_MNO --형번(Model No) , M.GOODS_DIV --제품/자재구분 , R1.CODE_NM AS GOODS_DIV_NM , M.MATR_CLNT_DIV --거래처구분 , R2.CODE_NM AS MATR_CLNT_DIV_NM , M.MATR_DIV --자재유형 , R3.CODE_NM AS MATR_DIV_NM , M.MATR_GRP --자재분류-자재그룹 , R4.CODE_NM AS MATR_GRP_NM , M.MATR_UNIT --단위 , R5.CODE_NM AS MATR_UNIT_NM , A.CURR_CD --통화단위 , NVL(A.MATR_UPR, 0) AS MATR_UPR --구매단가 , NVL(A.DEDUCT_UPR, 0) AS DEDUCT_UPR --공제단가 , A.MATR_UPR_RMK --비고 , NVL(A.USE_YN, 'N') AS USE_YN --사용여부 FROM TB_BM11M01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS C ON C.CLNT_CD = A.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM05M01 AS M ON M.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND M.MATR_CD = A.MATR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = A.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = M.GOODS_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R2 ON R2.CODE_ID = M.MATR_CLNT_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R3 ON R3.CODE_ID = M.MATR_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R4 ON R4.CODE_ID = M.MATR_GRP LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R5 ON R5.CODE_ID = M.MATR_UNIT WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}

SELECT MAX(A.FILE_TRGT_KEY) AS FILE_TRGT_KEY , MAX(A.MATR_CD) AS MATR_CD , MAX(A.ADPT_DT) AS ADPT_DT FROM ( SELECT FILE_TRGT_KEY , CO_CD , MATR_CD , CLNT_CD , CURR_CD , TO_CHAR(ADPT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADPT_DT FROM TB_BM11M01 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND A.MATR_CD = #{matrCd} AND A.CLNT_CD = #{clntCd} AND A.CURR_CD = #{currCd} AND A.ADPT_DT = TO_DATE( #{adptDt},'YYYYMMDD')
